Texts.Chs: 在一个古老的书卷上，我从其潦草的字迹中竟然找到了一个我们科学考察目标星球的坐标。让我试图呼叫考察团时，它们毫无回应，我应该快点通过S.A.I.前往那里，调查究竟发生了什么事。
Texts.Eng: I've found an ancient text, and am alarmed. Scrawled within are coordinates that match up exactly with a ^orange;recent research expedition^reset; we sent out to the fringes. I get no response when hailing them. S.A.I.L can take me there.

Texts.Chs: 考察团没有人幸存下来，我必须把报告提交至星际管理处，让它们把这颗星球列入禁区，我还得让它们使用星轨炮将其毁灭。这颗星球简直就是噩梦之源。
Texts.Eng: With no survivors, all that I have to report is...avoid this world. Recommending immediate sterilization of the site via orbital bombardment. No one should suffer that, ever again.
